title: UN Takeover Happening With Chaos & Crisis While American Media Looks the Other Way (Video) | International | Before It's News
text: UN Takeover Happening With Chaos & Crisis While American Media Looks the Other Way (Video) The United Nations have been holding its Future Summit recently, and pretty much no one in the Mockingbird media is telling anyone about their underhanded schemes to take over the world. Investigative journalist [Alex Newman](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly9zdWJzdGFjay5jb20vQGxpYmVydHlzZW50aW5lbC9wLTE0OTQwOTk2OQ==) has been at the Pact for the Future summit and reported on it, though they have tried to keep him away from many areas. Award-winning journalist Alex Newman, author of the popular book [Deep State: The Invisible Government Behind The Scenes](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly9hbXpuLnRvLzNCb3BtbU0=), has been warning of plans by the United Nations for total tyrannical control of your life. This past weekend at UN headquarters in New York City, all countries sealed the deal to hand over your freedoms. Newman explained to Greg Hunter on [USA Watchdog](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly91c2F3YXRjaGRvZy5jb20v), “This is probably the most important story of the decade. Every world leader was there. Joe Biden was there. Almost every world leader on the planet was there. Every president, king and dictator were all there, and they are all signing what the UN calls the ‘[Pact for the Future](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudW4ub3JnL3NpdGVzL3VuMi51bi5vcmcvZmlsZXMvc290Zi1wYWN0X2Zvcl90aGVfZnV0dXJlX2Fkb3B0ZWQucGRm).’” This, in their own words, is going to morph the United Nations into the “UN 2.0,” Newman shared. Every area of your life is going to be affected by this agreement,” thundered Newman, who has reported on UN events for over a decade. “Until this was approved, there was not a peep from the fake media in the United States.” Article posted with permission from [Sons of Liberty Media](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly9zb25zb2ZsaWJlcnR5bWVkaWEuY29tL3VuLXRha2VvdmVyLWhhcHBlbmluZy13aXRoLWNoYW9zLWNyaXNpcy13aGlsZS1hbWVyaWNhbi1tZWRpYS1sb29rcy10aGUtb3RoZXItd2F5LXZpZGVvLw==) Anyone can [join](/v3/login/new/).
